content: One thing that really stood out was the emphasis on active listening and asking effective questions. We did a lot of group activities and role-playing exercises that helped me become more comfortable with these skills. The workshop was held at the downtown convention center, and the instructor, Jane Smith, was really knowledgeable and engaging. As for motivation, I want to improve my public speaking skills for both personal and professional reasons. I believe it'll help me communicate more effectively in meetings and presentations at work, and also make me more confident in social situations.
